title: How Jordan Klepper's "Trump Diet" brought him to "the fringe"
description: Jordan Klepper, comedian and host of Comedy Central's "The Opposition," joins Chuck to talk about the blessing, and curse, of having a news cycle defined so clearly by President Trump.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
